contents.description: Fresh cabbage, celery, delicious tree ears, carrots and clear rice noodles prepared in a quick wok for optimum flavor. Served with our special sauce. Not spicy unless requested.
contents.name: Egg Rolls

contents.description: Little purse dumplings filled with coarsely ground pork, fresh ginger, garlic and vegetables. Served with our special sauce. Our chef recommends this one.
contents.name: Deep Fried Dumplings

contents.description: Little purse dumplings filled with coarse ground pork, fresh ginger, garlic and vegetables. Served with sweet and sour sauce.
contents.name: Deep Fried Dumplings/ Sweet and Sour Sauce

contents.description: Fresh Calamari toasted with batter in a wok until crispy. Sprinkled with seasoned salt and pepper. Excellent starter!
contents.name: Salt and Pepper Calamari

contents.description: Halt a dozen oysters combined with flour, salt and black pepper. Served with ginger garlic sauce.
contents.name: Deep Fried Oysters

contents.description: Jumbo shrimp are rolled in eggs and flour, then deep fried until lightly crispy. Served with our house-made sweet and sour sauce.
contents.name: Fried Prawns with Sweet and Sour Sauce

contents.description: Egg, cabbage, tree ears, green onions, ginger, garlic and wine, quick-woked, and served with four rice pancakes and ho sen-plum sauce.
contents.name: Mo Si Vegetables

contents.description: Marinated shrimp, hot waked with green onions, tomato sauce, pineapple, sesame oil, garlic, ginger and broth poured over hot crispy rice cakes.
contents.name: Sizzling Rice Shrimp

contents.description: From hunan province served at room temperature
contents.name: Deep Fried Won Ton

contents.description: Four won ton in a tasty broth, with bok choy. Won ton are filled with shrimp and chopped meat.
contents.name: WonTon-Soup

contents.description: Eggs, bean curd, bamboo shoots and carrots.
contents.name: Hot and Sour Soup

contents.description: Three little purses dumplings in a tasty broth, with green onions and a touch of sesame oil. Dumplings ore filled with seasoned vegetables and chopped meat.
contents.name: Dumpling Soup

contents.description: Egg drop, snow peas, and carrots in a tasty chicken broth.
contents.name: Egg Drop Soup

contents.description: Egg drop, shrimp, scallops, snow peas, and carrots in a tasty chicken broth, served with sizzling rice on the side.
contents.name: Seafood Sizzling Rice Soup

contents.description: Unforgettable sauce mixed with cucumber silvers and bean sprouts. Our sauce makes this one outstanding.
contents.name: Bean Sprout Cucumber Salad

contents.description: Steamed julienne eggplant served with delicious garlic sauce prepared with Chinese parsley, hot oil, vinegar and garlic - marvelous before dinner as a snack.
contents.name: Julienne Eggplant Salad

contents.description: Small strips of fresh chicken with silvers of cucumber and translucent rice noodles prepared with our old-recipe sauce. It's a real favorite.
contents.name: Chicken Salad

contents.text: Our smoked products, including ham and bacon, are smoked and prepared here on the premises. We bum real old-fashioned hardwood in the smoking process to obtain the distinct strong taste so popular in Hunan Province.
(Note: much stronger smoked flavors than domestic meats)

contents.description: Sliced smooked ham souteed with bamboo shoots carrots bell pepper with hot peper
contents.name: Our Own Smoked Ham

contents.description: Try this if you don't mind using your fingers. Small chunks of smoked chicken, bone-in for flavor, woked with bell pepper, carrots, bamboo shoots and hot-garlic sauce. Chicken smoked by us same as duck below.
contents.name: Our Own Smoked Chicken

contents.description: Try this if you don't mind using your fingers. Small chunks of duck, which have been smoked by us, woked with bell pepper, sliced bamboo shoots, garlic and hot pepper. Using almond wood from Modesto, we smoke this duck for a minimum of 8 hours with as little heat from the smoke as possible. Fat and bones remain with the chunks to enhance the delicious flavor. Lot of efforts goes into this one, but it's well worth it.
contents.name: Smoked Duck Hunanese

contents.description: Our smoked ham wok-cooked with fresh cloves of garlic, spring onions, and bamboo shoots. This is our own authentic Hunanese recipe for smoked meat, which is popular with our customers.
contents.name: Our Own Smoked Ham with Fresh Cloves of Garlic

contents.description: This hot and sour taste is probably the most celebrated sauce of the Hunanese. It really contains only a small amount of souring agent (vinegar). Lightly saute beef in oil and removed from wok, add ginger, garlic, carrots, onions and stir lightly until flavors are blended. Add wine, hot and sour sauce, and return beef to the wok and toss lightly.
contents.name: Hot and Sour Beef

contents.description: Shredded beef placed briefly in hot wok. Remove beef and replace with bamboo shoots, bell peppers, fermented black beans, garlic and ginger. Return beef to wok for one minute.
contents.name: Sliced Beef with Bell Peppers in Black Bean Sauce

contents.description: Slices of beef ore‏ quick-woked lightly in oil then removed from wok. Broccoli steamed separately for I minute. Hot wok added garlic, ginger, wine and brown bean sauce, then return broccoli in wok cooked for another minute, place beef in wok and toss together
contents.name: Sliced Beef with Broccoli

contents.description: Try this one, it's‏ really tasty, we use our own curry sauce.
contents.name: Sliced Beef with Curry Garlic and Hot Sauce

contents.description: Thinly sliced beef treated to very hot wok for one minute. Remove beef and place slivers of carrots, onion, and green onions in wok. Add ginger, garlic and spicy wine sauce and return beef to wok for one minute. Excellent!
contents.name: Spicy Beef with Green Onions in Wine Sauce

contents.description: Slices of beef are quick woked lightly in oil then removed from wok. Green onions, wine and bean curd are placed in the hot wok and the beef is added and all are tossed together. This is a great high-protein dish and is very tasty.
contents.name: Beef with Bean Cake

contents.description: Jumbo shrimp and beef placed in hot wok with oil, quickly toss and remove. Add water chestnuts, bamboo shoots, onion, wine and hot garlic sauce. Separately deep fry peanuts, then odd peanuts and shrimp to wok containing other ingredients and toss lightly. Simply scrumptious.
contents.name: Gon-Pou Shrimp and Beef Hunan

contents.description: Slices of beef are quick-woked lightly in oil then removed. String beans fried separately for one minute. Place garlic, ginger, wine and brown bean sauce in wok, then return string beans and cook for another minute. Place beef in wok and toss together.
contents.name: Beef with String Beans

contents.description: Egg, cabbage, tree ears, green onions with slivers of pork, ginger, garlic and wine, quick woked and served with four rice pancakes and ho sen-plum sauce. You place the mixture on the pancakes and roll it up and eat with your fingers.
contents.name: Mo Si Pork

contents.description: Due to the time consuming steps of preparation this dish must be ordered two days in advance
contents.name: Sliced Fresh Tender Pork with Hot garlic Sauce

contents.description: Roll small pork pieces‏ in eggs and flour and deep fry. In a separate wok, a sauce is prepared with garlic, bell pepper, carrots, white onion and pineapple. Remove pork from wok and toss with thick sauce in the wok. Great.
contents.name: Brandy's Pork with Sweet Sour and Sauce Hunan

contents.description: Sliced tenderized pork with‏ onion and cabbage sauteed with hot bean and wine sauce. No garlic in this one. A favorite of hunanese peasant workers.
contents.name: Harvest Pork with Hearty Vegetables

contents.description: Shredded Pork, celery and carrots, cooked with bamboo shoots, fresh ginger sauce and hot bean sauce.
contents.name: Shredded Pork with Celery

contents.description: Deep-fried shredded pork with‏ bamboo shoots, bell peppers and carrots sauteed in hot bean sauce.
contents.name: Shredded Pork with Vegetables and Hot Bean Sauce.

contents.description: Bean curd stewed with a favorite meat sauce, green onions, green peas and hot bean sauce.
contents.name: Bean Curd with Meat Sauce

contents.description: String beans stewed with a flavorful meat sauce or hot bean sauce
contents.name: String Beans with Meat Sauce

contents.description: Mix tender slices of marinated lamb, julienne onions, celery, carrots, bell pep­pers and onion in wok. Pass lamb slices through hot-oil wok and set aside. Add the lamb to sauce and toss on crispy rice noodles.
contents.name: Lamb with Crispy Rice Noodles

contents.description: Slices of Australian lamb are quick-woked lightly in oil then removed. String beans fried separately for one minute. Place garlic, ginger, wine and brown bean sauce. Place lamb in wok and toss together.
contents.name: Lamb with String Beans

contents.description: Toss bean curd into wok and add cabbage, onion and hot bean sauce with wine. Saute' while tossing together.
contents.name: Harvest Bean Curd

contents.description: Onion, wine, garlic, ginger, bean coke and Brandy's curry sauce all placed in the wok and tossed lightly. This one is very good if you don't have a honkering for meat.
contents.name: Bean Curd with Curry

contents.description: Slivers of bamboo shoots, tree ears, bok choy, ginger, garlic, wine, quick-woked with bean curd which has been deep fried.
contents.name: Old Country Vegetables

contents.description: Broccoli pre-cooked for tenderness then placed in wok with slivers of bamboo shoots, tree ears, deep fried bean curd, ginger, wine and garlic. Quick - woked with or without pepper spices.
contents.name: Old Country Vegetables with Broccoli

contents.description: Bok choy, sliced carrots, bamboo shoots and bean curd stir-fried with wine and fresh garlic.
contents.name: Sauteed Deluxe Vegetables

contents.description: Nice light dish.
contents.name: Bean Curd with Chinese Pickled Vegetables

contents.description: Served hot. Steamed julienne eggplant with an excellent garlic sauce prepared with Chinese parsley, hot oil, vinegar and garlic. A great light dish, good any time of the day.
contents.name: Spicy Eggplant

contents.description: Lightly deep fry string beans, remove and drain oil, in hot wok, odd ginger, garlic, radish, add string beans and tossed in wok until done.
contents.name: Vegetarian String Beans

contents.description: Slivers of tender pork cooked with our Chinese pickled vegetables. Very interesting taste.
contents.name: Shredded Pork with Chinese Pickled Vegetables

contents.description: Strong garlic flavor cooked with bell pepper, carrots and bamboo shoots. A tasty dish without the hot pepper.
contents.name: Bite-size Boneless Chicken with Fresh Garlic Sauce

contents.description: Beef chunks slow-cooked for several hours until deliciously tender. Served over cabbage.
contents.name: Stewed Beef Chunks

contents.description: Beef with wine, ginger, garlic, bamboo shoots and green onions. Very flavorful.
contents.name: Sliced Beef with Green Onions

contents.name: Brandy Ho's Special Chow Mein

contents.description: Prepared with shrimp, chicken and beef.

contents.description: Old country hot and spicy dishes the spiceness of any item we served can be adjusted upon request when order
contents.name: A Laa Carte

contents.description: Lender diced boneless chicken sauteed with bell peppers, carrots, hot and sour sauce, garlic, young bamboo shoots and fresh minced ginger.
contents.name: Hot and Sour Chicken

contents.description: Place tender chicken in hot oil wok with ginger and garlic and toss until half done. Add onion, bamboo shoots, hot garlic sauce, and Brandy's curry sauce and toss for a few minutes until done.
contents.name: Diced Boneless Chicken with Curry, Garlic and Hot Sauce

contents.description: Saute boneless chicken with‏ fermented black bean sauce, ginger, garlic, and wine until half done. Add onions, bell pepper, and hot spices and continue to toss in wok until done.
contents.name: Si Foo Chicken with Black Bean Sauce

contents.description: Place boneless diced chicken, ginger and garlic in hot wok with a small amount of oil. loss in wok until half done. Add onion, bamboo shoots, hot garlic sauce, and water chestnuts and toss lightly. To this mixture add peanuts that have been separately deep-fried; toss in wok a few minutes until done, and you have a delicious dish.
contents.name: Gon-Pou Chicken Hunan

contents.description: Fry string beans separately. Place tender chicken hot oil wok with ginger, garlic and hot bean sauce until half done. Add string beans and continue to toss in wok until done.
contents.name: Diced Boneless Chicken with String Beans

contents.description: Diced Chicken ore quick-woked lightly in oil then removed from wok. Broccoli steamed separately for 1 minute. Hot wok added garlic, ginger, wine and brown bean sauce, then return broccoli in wok cooked for another minute, place chicken in wok and toss together
contents.name: Diced Chicken with Broccoli

contents.description: Roll diced chicken eggs and flour and deep fry until lightly crispy. In separate wok prepare a sauce with garlic, ginger, honey and hot sauce. Remove chicken from fry wok and toss with the thick sauce.
contents.name: General Chicken

contents.description: Roll diced thicken in egg and flour and deep fried until lightly crispy. In sepa­rate wok, prepare a sauce with garlic, ginger, honey and chili. Remove chicken from fry wok and toss with the thick sauce.
contents.name: Sweet and Sour Chicken

contents.description: Roll diced boneless chicken‏ in eggs and dour. Fry in a separate wok till Crispy and Golden Brown. Toss with the light honey, lime and lemon sauce. All white meat Chicken for S1 extra. Three Delicacies
contents.name: Lemon Chicken

contents.description: Toss fry scallops and shrimp in oil for a few minutes and remove from wok. In this wok place diced chicken, ginger, garlic, fermented black bean sauce and wine and toss for a few minutes. Add onion, bell pepper and bamboo shoots and toss lightly. Return the shrimp and scallops and toss lightly.
contents.name: Three Delicacies

contents.description: Stir-fried beef, scallops and shrimp in oil for o few minutes and remove from wok. Add wine sauce, bamboo shoots, onion, ginger, garlic and bell pepper and stir-fry for a few minutes. Add beef, scallops and shrimp and toss lightly. Very good! Brandy's favorite!
contents.name: Brandy's Dinner

contents.description: Scallops cooked with bell peppers, bamboo shoots, and onions in hot black bean sauce. A unique old country method.
contents.name: Old Country Scallops

contents.description: San Francisco locations only. Rock cod fried and removed from pan, where delicious broth is prepared using fresh ginger, garlic, green onions, hot bean sauce and wine. Broth poured over fish and served with carrots silvers as garnish.
contents.name: Hunanese Whole Fish

contents.description: Lightly dredge fresh cut fish fillet in flour and deep fry until brown. In a sepa­rate wok lightly oiled, place bean coke chunks, ginger, garlic, onion, bamboo shoots, and wine. Toss for a few minutes until well blended, add fish with a little broth and allow to simmer for a minute or two.
contents.name: Braised Fish Fillet

contents.description: Shrimp peeled and chopped, then mosh shrimp to soft pulp and mixed with ground pork. Bread removed from crust and mixtures spread on bread. Then the mixture dipped with white sesame and fry until golden brown. crispy and delicious
contents.name: Sesame Shrimp Toast

contents.description: Place shelled shrimp that have been marinated in egg white, wine and tapioca very briefly in hot wok and remove. To this wok, add green onion sections, tomato sauce, sesame oil, garlic, ginger, pineapple and a liberal amount of broth so that the result is a sauce to which the shrimp is re-entered for a minute or two. Pour over hot crispy rice cakes at the time of serving.
contents.name: Sizzling Rice Shrimp

contents.description: Shrimp quick-cooked with bamboo shoots, bell peppers and onions in hot block bean sauce. Unique old country method.
contents.name: Old Country Shrimp

contents.description: Place jumbo shrimp in hot wok with oil, quickly toss and remove. Place broth, wine, ginger, onion and brandy's curry sauce in wok and stir until flavors are blended. Return shrimp to wok and toss lightly.
contents.name: Curried Shrimp • Hunan

contents.description: lumbo Shrimp are rolled in eggs and flour, then deep fried until lightly crispy. Toss with the light honey, lime and Lemon sauce.White meat available, $ 1 additional
contents.name: Lemon Shrimp

contents.description: lumbo shrimp are tossed quickly in hot wok with oil and removed. Place water chestnuts, bamboo shoots, onion, wine, and hot garlic sauce in wok. Separate deep fry peanuts. Add peanuts and shrimp to wok containing other ingredients and toss lightly. Simply scrumptious!
contents.name: Gon-Pou Shrimp • Hunan

contents.description: Tenderized pieces of calamari‏ that have been marinated in egg white, soy sauce and wine are passed through hot-oil wok and set aside. To this wok add julienne onions, bamboo shoots, bell peppers and onions with hot bean paste, wine ginger, garlic and broth, re-enter the calamari, tossing for two or three minutes.
contents.name: Marinated Calamari with Black Bean Sauce

contents.description: Tenderized pieces of calamari‏ that have been marinated in egg white, soy sauce and wine are passed through a hot-oil wok and set aside. To this wok and bamboo shoots, onion, hot garlic sauce, bell peppers and Brandy's curry sauce; re-enter calamari and toss for a few minutes until done.
contents.name: Calamari with Curry and Wine Sauce

contents.description: Jumbo shrimp and rolled in eggs and flour, then deep fried until lightly crispy. In separate wok a sauce is prepared with garlic, ginger, honey and chili. Remove shrimp from fry wok and toss with the thick sauce.
contents.name: Sweet and Sour Shrimp

contents.description: Prawns are rolled in flour lightly and deep fried. Removed prawns from fry wok and toss with our special house-mode mayonnaise sauce. Served with honey-glazed and sesame walnuts. A kid's favorite!!!
contents.name: Honey Walnut Prawns

contents.description: Pink meat trout steamed for 10 to IS minutes. Slivers of fresh ginger and green onions are added, doused with a mixture hot oil and soy sauce. (This menu item is not always available.) (North Beach location only)
contents.name: Steamed Fish with Ginger and Green Onions

contents.description: Roll jumbo shrimp in eggs and flour and deep fry to lightly crispy. In separate wok a sauce is prepared with garlic, ginger, honey and hot sauce. Remove shrimp from dry wok and toss with the thick sauce in the wok. Sprinkled with sesame.
contents.name: General Shrimp

contents.description: Separately fried the string‏ bean. Place jumbo shrimp in hot oil wok quickly toss and removed from wok. To this wok add brown bean sauce, garlic, ginger and wine. Add shrimp and string bean to wok and toss lightly.
contents.name: String Bean with Shrimps

contents.description: Shrimp are quick-woked lightly in oil then removed from wok. Broccoli steamed separately for I minute. Hot wok added garlic, ginger, wine and brown bean sauce, then return broccoli in wok cooked for another minute, place shrimp in wok and toss together
contents.name: Shrimp with Broccoli

contents.text: Every project begins as a noodle, flavored by your brand’s precise list of ingredients - the qualities expressed by what your brand wants to be.

The preparation process is determined by the needs of each project, be it a logo, an ad, or a website. Time in the kitchen, recipe testing, and presentation vary depending on what’s being served. (Hint: good cooks always taste as they go along. )

contents.text: Here come the rain.....this monday we plan to have come & get a sample of the fresh homemade soups
January, 09, 2012 is a new day of the second week in 2012
After a nice weekend I have to come back to work & make some new soup. so Monday I work to have soup like
We are working to have for Tuesday, January, 03, 2012
Also we have Special Romanian Food
And this Monday December, 19, 2011 we will have
You are welcome to come & have some to taste
After 2 days of rest lots of soups boil in my head, but for Monday December, 12, 2011
After 4 days of rest & hunger is about time to see Muntean's soup
Bread bowl, bowl of soup w/ romanian bread, rowl of chili w/ corn bread
Thanksgiving week is here of the year 2010. we plan to have good new soups for this week
Also we have bread bowl.... $ 7.00 tax included
Soup lover combination....$ 9.25 ( four small cups w/ bread )
Chili Trio....bowl of chili, corn bread & midium drink....$ 9.00
November is here so is chili
Monday we start serving new item like

contents.text: All the soups & CHILI are homemade
Come on in & we will give you free sample
For October, 31, 2011 we plan to have soups like
LOOK FOR BREAD BOWL...with homemade soups.......$ 6.50
LOOK FOR SOUP LOVER COMBINATION....with homemade bread....$ 9.25
LOOK FOR EVERYDAY MUNTEAN TRIVIA........10% of of your bill
It is go to be a wet week & I am ready for you to prepare some soups
And more special sandwiches coming everyday.come & see us ask for george & he will give soups to taste.
For September, 26, 2011 we plan to have vegetarian soups
.we invite you to syop by special now that the wheter is getting cold & ask for George, & he will give to taste some soup & tell you about them....they are homemade soups.....
Few more days & Summer is finish. I will get more soup for the winter & Chili will come back,
I had a good 3 day rest & now I am ready for new soups:
.just stop by & ask George to give you some to taste

contents.text: Our korean, japanese, & chinese restaurant has a delectable menu that will please even the pickiest of eaters. From our 11 different kinds of traditional korean soups to our mouthwatering chicken & pork dishes you will walk away from your meal full. Check out our menu below for a list of some of our menu items.
Served w/ an assortment of 8–12 side dishes

All meat is pre-marinated & is served to you raw w/ sides & seasonings. On each large table, there are two large barbecue grills on which you barbecue your meal. You can either do it yourself or have a member of our friendly staff help you! It's fun for the whole family!
All lunch & daily specials served w/ rice.
